## blockToken() function

Adds a JTI to the in-memory blocklist, preventing further use of that token. If the blocklist has reached its maximum size, the oldest entry is evicted first.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function blockToken(jti: string): void;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

jti


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The unique token ID to block


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void
